name: We've Got Company
description:
We've Got Company

You invited your friends (and your crush) over to hang out. The only problem? You completely forgot about it until 5 minutes before they arrive, and it’s a wreck! Frantically clean or face humiliation.

Features:

  • Face off with your nemesis (and pet), "Clutter the Cat"
  • Get spammed by texts from your friend.
  • Graphics powered by Unreal 5.

Controls:

  • Left mouse button press: pick up object
  • Left mouse button release: Throw
  • Right mouse: interact
  • wsad keys: frantically run around the house

Credits:

  • Programming - Jacob Bradshaw
  • Music - Jacob Bradshaw
  • Testing - Jacob Bradshaw
  • Story - Jacob Bradshaw
  • Quality Assurance - Jacob Bradshaw
  • Level Design - Jacob Bradshaw
  • AI Lead - Jacob Bradshaw
  • Cat throwing idea - Jerry Bradshaw
  • Encouraging uncle - Geremy Bradshaw
  • Cat inclusion inspiration - Jim Davis
  • SFX - freesound.org
  • Engine - Epic Games
  • Models and animations - Free asset giveaways from Epic Games.

Change log and planned changes:

  • Fix the throwing to throw toward the point at which you are aiming.
  • The cat has been observed falling through the floor. * FIXED in 1.2
  • Win condition was broken due to lack of skill in my play testing. * FIXED in 1.2
